Banner.Description: With a dynamic 4-year journey in tech, I'm a passionate coder & solution architect with a learning journey from focusing on foundational knowledge about the art of programming and software engineering to navigating the corporate realms aspiring to be a Associate Software Engineer. Proficient in Python, C++, JavaScript, MongoDB, Git, & Linux. Currently, I'm steering my learning voyage into the realms of Node JS & Flutter Development. Join me on this tech odyssey, where innovation meets dedication, & let's craft the future together!
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: My tech journey started in college, dedicating 3 years to Open Source Contributions and landing an internship atHoneyBadgersCo as a flutter developer. Now, with my Bachelor's degree completed, I'm venturing into the corporate market. Meanwhile, I'm expanding my expertise at this time with a focus on Node JS & Flutter Development, showcasing my commitment to continual learning.
Beyond coding, I'm a sports enthusiast and traveller with aspirations to utilise my time on this planet spreading love and joy. I bring the same energy at my work organizations as well.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Flutter Developer Intern
Description: Led a team of 13 passionate interns creating innovative flutter applications.
Implemented core features for said projects that eased project management for the senior devs.
Gained expertise in Flutter SDK, Google Firebase, backend architectures, Postman.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Rain
Description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of an Android application, which included bringing regional forecasting features to the android application.

Provided timely updates and required patches for implimentation of new features such as Air Quality widgets, ensuring that 10k+ users over the globe always get the most reliable and stable experience.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: G-Books
Description: Part of a team of 5 Android Enthusiasts for developing an Open Source Android app during 45+ days of facilitating Android Study Jams on college campus under GDSC (local community).
Helped implementing the database models for the app and used the Google Books API to search, preview, and buy any number of e-books out of 1000K+ available over there.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Stock Price Prediction
Description: Scripted a CLI which makes an API call to Yahoo Finance or local file path and predicts the upcoming stock performance using a Recurrent Neural Network algorithm called LSTM at a very high success rate.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Windows Keylogger
Description: Developed a keylogger/test malware which generates a temporary email address and mails sensitive information like keystrokes and screenshots of the user's PC to an exteranl device using e-mail protocols.
The software can be used to test various antivirus softwares and can also be used during cybersecurity drills in an organisation.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Sneaker Shop
Description: Flutter project prepared to replicate a fine online shopping experience and provide a comfort zone for the sneaker and shoes enthusiasts.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: To-Do App
Description: A simple to do list app built with Flutter and Hive (local storage) made to get familiar with local storage in the flutter framework.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Sushi App
Description: A minor project based on the flutter framwework built to get familiar with the Provider state management tool.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Android Patient Tracker
Description: A flutter based project made during a Hackathon in a team of 3 individuals to provide data management solutions for Hospitals.
Digitally track the queue of patients along with notes management after Doctor visits for secure and smooth flow of operations.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I welcome the opportunity to engage in discussions about potential collaborations or new professional endeavors. Please feel free to reach out, and I will respond promptly upon receiving your message. Thank you for considering me, and I look forward to the possibility of connecting with you.
